Authors:
Paride Abliz, Yoshikazu Horie, Takashi Yaguchi, Kedirye
Kasim, Tohru Gonoi, Tetsuhiro Matsuzawa
Title:
Two new black Aspergillus isolated from clinical material of
human in Xinjang, China
Keywords:
Aspergillus tarimensis・Aspergillus
tianshanensis・Aspergillus section Nigri・ear secretions・pathogenic
fungi
Abstract:
Asperegillus tarimensis and Aspergillus tianshanensis
isolated from ear secretions of human in a Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous
Region, China are described and photographs of microscope and scanning
electron microscope. A. tarimensis is characterized by subglobose to
broadly ellipsoidal conidia with slight longitudinal orientation of
discontinuous color bars and ridges wall. A. tianshanensis is
characterized by subglobose to broadly ellipsoidal conidia with low
color bars and ridges definitely arranged in a longitudinal pattern
wall. The validation of those new species is supported further by
analyses of the β-tubulin, calmodulin and RPB2 gene sequences.
